message: Post your favorite.  I'll start.

Add and commit an ignore pattern to .hgignore:

ignore = ![ -n "$@" ] && echo '$@' >> `$HG root`/.hgignore && \
$HG commit `$HG root`/.hgignore -Am 'Add "$@" to .hgignore.'

Edit the current repository's .hg/hgrc file:

erc = !$EDITOR `$HG root`/.hg/hgrc
Example: hg ignore '*.pyc'

Empty the current MQ patch, leaving any changes in the working directory:

qempty = !$HG qrefresh -X `$HG root`
Work on upstream repository:

upstream = !"$HG" -R default $@

Example:
hg upstream tip
khaaaaaaan = blame -u
hm, $HG! ok, cool :)
blog = !hg slog -r "reverse(..$1 - ..master)" -l 500 # branch log
. =  summary
untrack = rm -Af
cm = commit --message
ls = log --limit 36 --template '{rev} {node|short} {date|shortdate} {author|user}@ {desc|strip|firstline}\n'
@rsvp rm -Af == forget in last versions of hg :-)

; show the currently applied mq patches
alias.qlog=log -pvr qbase:qtip
; show detailed info about one revision (like git show)
alias.show=log -pvr
; export the current applied mq patches
alias.qexport=export -r qbase:qtip
; calculate the top n committers for the repo
alias.top=!"$HG" log --template '{author|person}\n' | sed 's/"//g' | sort | uniq -c | sort -rn | head -n `expr "$1" \| 10`

Oh, wait, these are hg aliases…

    bm = bookmark
    conflicts = resolve -l
    resolved = resolve -m

for HGCMD in tip qser qpo qpop qpu qpush qfin qref qnew di qdi st rebase pull nudge sum
    do
        alias $HGCMD="hg $HGCMD"
    done
@brodie isn't hgext.churn enough to calculate top committers?

import-qtop = !qtop=`"$HG" qtop` && "$HG" qpop && "$HG" import --no-commit .hg/patches/$qtop && "$HG" qrm $qtop
mod-commit = !"$HG" qimport -rtip && qtop=`"$HG" qtop` && "$HG" qref -e && "$HG" qfinish $qtop
